name: Elementalist (EmperorOfTrees, Romita, Pia Colada, ITBOMB studios)
name_original: Elementalist (EmperorOfTrees, Romita, Pia Colada, ITBOMB studios)
description: You are playing as a young Elementalist who was experimenting with powers she did not understand. As a consequence, she is now stuck in a different elemental plane. You must help her escape by using her elemental magic to fight off the native creatures of the plane. Good Luck!
